description:
Even after hitting the deadly secret pressure point, the "jinchukyoku," Kenshiro cannot hold his ground against Souther`s overwhelming might.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Young Hero Challenges His Fate! Your Screaming Soul Shall Move the Heavens!!
Shukumei ni Idomu Chiisana Yuusha! Sono Tamashii no Sakebi ga Ten o Ugokasu!!
宿命に挑む小さな勇者! その魂の叫びが天を動かす!!
